column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I had very high expectations.  I expected the perfect Chicago style pizza.  And I got it!  I ordered the Molnati's Classic with sausage and pepperoni
column2: small size that could feed two very hungry people.  I called it in
column3: and picked it up for takeout -- and they were friendly
column5: and on time.  I highly recommend using this service.  Its hard to descibe the crunch and flavor of the buttery crust
column6: in combination with the fresh tomatoes on top and tons of cheese going with it.  I have no need to run around Chicago trying the others -- I'll just keep coming here for more.
